title: S12 Ep211: Madness in the Halls: Twisted Tales of Haunted Asylums & Penitentiaries
itunes:title: Madness in the Halls: Twisted Tales of Haunted Asylums & Penitentiaries
description:
Eric Vernor takes on a dark journey through the haunted hallways and operating rooms, cells and institutions where madness still seems to roam the corridors.
